bind.calculate: if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='booked','ready_state',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='ready','shipped_state',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='shipped','confirmed_state',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='confirmed','returned_state',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='','state',if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='shipping','shipped_state',''))))))

if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='booked','ready',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='ready','shipped',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='shipped','confirmed',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='confirmed','returned',if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/order_info/state ='',' ',if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='shipping','shipped',''))))))

if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='booking', /order/order_id ,if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/action_group/search_by_person ='yes',pulldata('Sheet1','order_id','unique_order_id', /order/order_info/select_order_id ),if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and /order/action_group/search_by_person ='no', /order/order_info/by_state_order_id ,if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='shipping' and /order/action_group/freight_payment_type ='per-item', /order/order_info/shipping_orders_ids ,''))))

if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='booking',count-selected( ../product_ids ),if( /order/action_group/action ='update' and ( /order/order_info/state ='booked' or /order/order_info/state ='ready' or /order/order_info/state ='shipped' or /order/order_info/state ='confirmed'),count-selected( ../line_item_product_ids ),if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='shipping' and /order/action_group/search_by_person ='yes', count-selected( /order/order_info/shipping_orders_ids ),if( /order/action_group/action ='new' and /order/action_group/new_action ='shipping' and /order/action_group/search_by_person ='no',1,''))))
